tokens.resolved_gloss: to stray (causatively, mislead), usually (figuratively) to mistake, especially (morally) to transgress; by extension (through the idea of intoxication) to reel, (figuratively) be enraptured
tokens.translation: to stray (causatively, mislead), usually (figuratively) to mistake, especially (morally) to transgress; by extension (through the idea of intoxication) to reel, (figuratively) be enraptured

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, nearness (used only as a preposition or an adverb), near; hence, generally, with, by, at, among, etc.

tokens.resolved_gloss: to stop (usually over night); by implication, to stay permanently; hence (in a bad sense) to be obstinate (especially in words, to complain)
